description: John Frieda Shine Conditioner is Infused with rosehip oil and our Shine-Enhancing Complex. Adds a lightweight shine to the surface of the hair strand for enhanced glossy hair across a range of shades and textures. Safe for use on natural or colour-treated hair. 1. BOOST HAIR SHINE - Reveal glossy, impossibly shiny hair by adding this hydrating conditioner for a silicone free shine that won't weigh down your style. 2. VIBRANT SHINE PRODUCTS - For silky smooth hair, use this detangling conditioner in conjunction with our full suite of Vibrant Shine products. 3. HYDRATING CONDITIONER - Our salon-quality hair conditioner for natural and colour treated hair works to reveal a healthier, silkier style. 4. FORMULATED WITHOUT PARABENS, SILICONE OR SLESSLS SULFATES
name: John Frieda Vibrant Shine Colour Shine Conditioner 250ml
